attributes.action: A National Day of Remembrance for those who died or were affected by Covid-19.
attributes.additional_details: Never in modern history has there been such an event that has touched every part of the world. No war has taken such a toll on the mental and physical health of the entire global population. Patients, Healthcare Professionals, Scientists, Business Owners, Hospitality, Travel & Tourism, Retail and many more have suffered. Never has so much work contributed to a revolutionary vaccine. The covid-19 crisis will define human history forever whether financially, physically or mentally.
attributes.background: A national day of remembrance to take place annually for those affected by Covid-19, those who died as a result of infection, and those families who have been affected. The day should also celebrate the work of those healthcare professionals and scientists who tirelessly fought to beat the virus.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561869
